con:soapui-project.name: xplan-dokumente-api
con:soapui-project.con:description:
For local execution use following property values:
baseUrlManagerApi=http://localhost:8086/xplan-manager-api
For execution against test environment use following property values:
baseUrlManagerApi=https://xplanbox.lat-lon.de

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to return document

con:method.name: listDocuments
con:method.con:description: List all documents of the plan List documents

con:method.name: showConfig
con:method.con:description: Returns the system and application configuration Show system and application configuration

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to return document

con:testCase.name: / TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [/] located at [/]

con:configuration.content: {"get":{"summary":"Show system and application configuration","description":"Returns the system and application configuration","operationId":"showConfig","responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/SystemConfig"}}}},"406":{"description":"Requested format is not available"}}}}

{"get":{"tags":["download"],"summary":"List documents","description":"List all documents of the plan","operationId":"listDocuments","parameters":[{"name":"planId","in":"path","description":"ID of the plan to return document","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Documents"},"400":{"description":"Invalid input"},"404":{"description":"Invalid planID"}}}}

{"get":{"tags":["download"],"summary":"Download document","description":"Download a document","operationId":"getDocument","parameters":[{"name":"planId","in":"path","description":"ID of the plan to return document","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123},{"name":"fileName","in":"path","description":"Name of the document","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Document"},"400":{"description":"Invalid input"},"404":{"description":"Invalid planID or fileName, document not found"}}},"head":{"tags":["download"],"summary":"Show download header","description":"Download a document","operationId":"headDocument","parameters":[{"name":"planId","in":"path","description":"ID of the plan to return document","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123},{"name":"fileName","in":"path","description":"Name of the document","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Document"},"400":{"description":"Invalid input"},"404":{"description":"Invalid planID or fileName, document not found"}}}}

con:testCase.name: /info TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [/info] located at [/info]

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
json = new JsonSlurper().parseText(messageExchange.response.responseContent) assert !(json.isEmpty())
assert json.version != null

con:testCase.name: /dokument/{planId} TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [/dokument/{planId}] located at [/dokument/{planId}]

con:testCase.name: /dokument/{planId}/{fileName} TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [/dokument/{planId}/{fileName}] located at [/dokument/{planId}/{fileName}]

con:configuration.scriptText: def expectedHeader = ["application/pdf"] def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def actualHeader = headers['Content-Type'] assert expectedHeader == actualHeader
def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def contentLength = headers['Content-Length'] assert contentLength[0].toInteger() == 67450
def expectedHeader = ["image/png"] def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def actualHeader = headers['Content-Type'] assert expectedHeader == actualHeader
def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def contentLength = headers['Content-Length'] assert contentLength[0].toInteger() == 320960
def expectedHeader = ["application/octet-stream"] def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def actualHeader = headers['Content-Type'] assert expectedHeader == actualHeader
def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def contentLength = headers['Content-Length'] assert contentLength[0].toInteger() == 73

def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def contentLength = headers['Content-Length'] assert contentLength[0].toInteger() == 67450
def expectedHeader = ["image/png"] def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def actualHeader = headers['Content-Type'] assert expectedHeader == actualHeader
def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def contentLength = headers['Content-Length'] assert contentLength[0].toInteger() == 320960
def expectedHeader = ["application/octet-stream"] def headers = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders def actualHeader = headers['Content-Type'] assert expectedHeader == actualHeader
